review_blob:
Strong mango aromas just opening up the can. Taste is heavy on the mango with some nice hop undertones and a clean finish. Super crushable. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Hop bomb up front settles into a nice after taste both piney and fruity. Just not balanced enough throughout to be on the level of Heady or Enjoy By

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
